content.query:
-- CREATE DATABASE bcdb;

-- alter database bcdb
--     COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;

-- ALTER DATABASE bcdb 
--     COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CS_AS;


-- USE bcdb;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE bc_sample
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://text2sqlstorage.blob.core.windows.net'
);

-- DROP EXTERNAL data SOURCE bc_sample;

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delimitedText
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
);

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'credit!23';

-- 스토리지 계정에서 SAS 액세스 서명 생성 필요
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL bc_sample
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-10-24T14:02:07Z&st=2024-10-14T06:02:07Z&spr=https&sig=vUlb7QXGmNsQnhHm1F6KLzZSUaiOb%2BFBD%2BwVwbLgZIc%3D';

-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE table1;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE table1
(
    STRD_YYMM varchar(40),
    SALE_DATE varchar(40),
    TIME_CD varchar(40),
    INDV_CP_DV_CD varchar(40),
    MER_SIDO_NM varchar(40),
    MER_CCG_NM varchar(40),
    MER_ADNG_NM varchar(40),
    MER_ADNG_NO varchar(40),
    MAIN_BUZ_DESC varchar(40),
    TP_GRP_NM varchar(40),
    ALS_MER_TPBUZ_NM varchar(40),
    CSTMR_SIDO_NM varchar(40),
    CSTMR_CCG_NM varchar(40),
    CSTMR_ADNG_NM varchar(40),
    CSTMR_ADNG_NO varchar(40),
    SE_CTGO_CD varchar(40),
    AGE_10_CD varchar(40),
    LIFE_GB_CD varchar(40),
    INDV_INCM_AMT varchar(40),
    MER_CNT varchar(40),
    SALE_AMT varchar(40),
    SALE_CNT varchar(40),
    MER_ADDR varchar(200) NULL,
    MER_TPBUZ_NM varchar(200) NULL
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = bc_sample,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet
);



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE table2
(
    SALE_DATE datetime2 NOT NULL,
    TIME_CD varchar(30) NOT NULL,
    INDV_CP_DV_CD varchar(30) NULL,
    MER_ADDR varchar(200) NULL,
    MER_TPBUZ_NM varchar(200) NULL,
    SEX_CTGO_CD varchar(30) NULL,
    AGE_10_CD varchar(30) NULL,
    LIFE_GB_CD varchar(30) NULL,
    MER_CNT numeric NOT NULL,
    SALE_AMT numeric NOT NULL,
    SALE_CNT numeric NOT NULL
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/bccard/',
    DATA_SOURCE = bc_sample,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet
);

SELECT * FROM table1;
